full_text: Case 1:20-cr-00330-PAE Document 755 Filed 08/10/22 Page 245 of 262 1956 LC8Cmax7 Rodgers - cross 1 A. Correct. 2 Q. You testified that Sarah Kellen appeared around 2000 -- sorry. 2001; right? 3 4 A. Yeah, September 2001. 5 Q. And she was one of these new assistants at that time period; right? 6 7 A. Yes. 8 Q. And you started speaking to her or Larry Visoski started speaking to her? 9 10 A. Correct. 11 Q. There were many other assistants that appeared over the years in the 2000s, weren't there? 12 13 A. Yes. 14 Q. And it's your recollection, wasn't it, that in 2003 or 15 2004, Ghislaine wasn't flying nearly as much with Mr. Epstein anymore at that point; isn't that right? 16 17 A. That is correct. 18 Q. Isn't it true that by 2004 or thereabouts, Ghislaine was in a committed relationship with another man? 19 20 A. Yes. 21 Q. You're familiar with Ted Waitt? 22 A. Yes. 23 Q. He is the cofounder of Gateway computers? 24 A. Yes. 25 Q. Ghislaine was in a relationship with Ted Waitt by 2004, SOUTHERN DISTRICT REPORTERS, P.C. (212) 805-0300 DOJ-OGR-00013523
